hasMenuItem.name: Classic Clubhouse

hasMenuItem.name: Beer-Battered Fish & Chips

hasMenuItem.name: Cheezy Grilled Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: This Parmesan-crusted sandwich, served on sourdough, has 4 cheeses on the outside and 3 on the inside – Havarti, Canadian Cheddar & Pepper Jack! Served with fries.

hasMenuItem.name: New Style Philly Cheesesteak
hasMenuItem.description: Melt-in-your-mouth AAA ribeye stacked high on a 10" artisan bun with sautéed peppers and onions, American and Swiss cheese, mayo and au jus. More meat! More cheese!

hasMenuItem.name: Deep Dish Apple Extravagana
hasMenuItem.description: Special apple dessert with a crunchy topping, served with caramel and cinnamon.

hasMenuItem.description: Garlic bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Baked Brocco 4-Cheese

hasMenuItem.name: Reuben Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description:
Corned beef piled high with sauerkraut, Swiss cheese and mustard,
on grilled swirl rye bread. Served with your choice of crispy skin-on fries
or cup of soup.

hasMenuItem.name: Weiner Schnitzel
hasMenuItem.description: Choice of pork or chicken schnitzel, hand breaded and fried to golden brown. Accompanied with Bavarian style red cabbage and Yukon gold mashed potatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Pumpkin Pie

Rich, smooth pumpkin filling, delicately spiced with

and topped with fresh whipped cream.

review.reviewBody: Eggs were delicious. Cooked just as requested. The bacon is delicious, juicy with a crunch. Sausage flavour was good but was slightly on the dry side. Pancakes were delicious but the syrup container cups were not a good choice for packaging. The syrup spilled in the white to go bag. Overall, will be eating here again!
Worst sandwich ever. Salty and most of the cheese was in the box. Also, was supposed to come with soup. Nope, came with soggy fries. Waste of money.
Chicken and waffles is definitely a heater highly recommend adding the 3 pce sausage on the side if your looking for a little bit of salty with some sweet this is the meal for you !

Delicious!! Veggies are cooked perfectly and the seasoning is amazing! The short rib, demi-glaze and potatoes are delicious! Plus, the food was still piping hot when I received it!! I would definitely order this again!
Bennies were top notch. Hash browns were cold. Like refrigerator cold. And they came from the same box.
